AudioStreamGenerator
====================

**ç»§æ‰¿ï¼š** :ref:`AudioStream<class_AudioStream>` **<** :ref:`Resource<class_Resource>` **<** :ref:`RefCounted<class_RefCounted>` **<** :ref:`Object<class_Object>`

.. rst-class:: classref-introduction-group

æè¿°

**AudioStreamGenerator** æ˜¯ä¸€ç§éŸ³é¢‘æµï¼Œå®ƒè‡ªå·±å¹¶ä¸æ’­æ”¾å£°éŸ³ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯è¦ç”¨è„šæœ¬æ¥ä¸ºå®ƒç”ŸæˆéŸ³é¢‘æ•°æ®ã€‚å¦è§ :ref:`AudioStreamGeneratorPlayback<class_AudioStreamGeneratorPlayback>`\ ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ç”¨å®ƒæ¥ç”Ÿæˆæ­£å¼¦æ³¢çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼š


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var playback # å­˜æ”¾ AudioStreamGeneratorPlaybackã€‚
    @onready var sample_hz = $AudioStreamPlayer.stream.mix_rate
    var pulse_hz = 440.0 # å£°éŸ³æ³¢å½¢çš„é¢‘ç‡ã€‚
    
    func _ready():
        $AudioStreamPlayer.play()
        playback = $AudioStreamPlayer.get_stream_playback()
        fill_buffer()
    
    func fill_buffer():
        var phase = 0.0
        var increment = pulse_hz / sample_hz
        var frames_available = playback.get_frames_available()
    
        for i in range(frames_available):
            playback.push_frame(Vector2.ONE * sin(phase * TAU))
            phase = fmod(phase + increment, 1.0)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    [Export] public AudioStreamPlayer Player { get; set; }
    
    private AudioStreamGeneratorPlayback _playback; // å­˜æ”¾ AudioStreamGeneratorPlaybackã€‚
    private float _sampleHz;
    private float _pulseHz = 440.0f; // éŸ³é¢‘æ³¢å½¢çš„é¢‘ç‡ã€‚
    
    public override void _Ready()
    {
        if (Player.Stream is AudioStreamGenerator generator) // Type as a generator to access MixRate.
        {
            _sampleHz = generator.MixRate;
            Player.Play();
            _playback = (AudioStreamGeneratorPlayback)Player.GetStreamPlayback();
            FillBuffer();
        }
    }
    
    public void FillBuffer()
    {
        double phase = 0.0;
        float increment = _pulseHz / _sampleHz;
        int framesAvailable = _playback.GetFramesAvailable();
    
        for (int i = 0; i < framesAvailable; i++)
        {
            _playback.PushFrame(Vector2.One * (float)Mathf.Sin(phase * Mathf.Tau));
            phase = Mathf.PosMod(phase + increment, 1.0);
        }
    }
